title: Facilio
description: Facilio provides an innovative ESG reporting platform that leverages IoT technology for real-time building operations and energy management, offering businesses seamless integration with existing systems to optimize sustainability strategies and reduce environmental impact.

children.value: Facilio provides an innovative ESG reporting platform that leverages IoT technology for real-time building operations and energy management, offering businesses seamless integration with existing systems to optimize sustainability strategies and reduce environmental impact.
